entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 9.8°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
